name: flac

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Encoder/decoder for the Free Lossless Audio Codec

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: libogg
dependencies.description:
Ogg is a multimedia container format, and the native file and stream
format for the Xiph.org multimedia codecs.

dependent_to.name: sox
dependent_to.description: SoX, the Swiss Army knife of sound processing programs.

dependent_to.name: libsndfile
dependent_to.description:
Libsndfile is a C library for reading and writing files containing
sampled sound (such as MS Windows WAV and the Apple/SGI AIFF format)
through one standard library interface. It is released in source code
format under the Gnu Lesser General Public License.
